Narrative:
Event planning is an art, and it's one of those things that you can do your whole life and still learn new tips.

For example, did you know that the first thing you should do when planning any event is write down the purpose of the event? 

Define what success would look like for this particular gathering and make sure that you have a way of measuring it. 

Not only does this help you avoid hosting events that don't really have much of a point, but it also helps you identify what to focus on in order to make your event successful.

There's no single secret to planning a great event but we have some ideas!
